divs: Sighting DetailsI DONT KNOW WHAT IT WAS BUT IT LOOKED LIKE A STAR AND THEN IT WAS MOVING ME AND MY GIRLFRIEND WENT OUTSIDE ON OUR BACK PORCH AND I LOOKED UP [LIKE I ALWAYS DO, ALWAYS TRYING TO SEE A UFO BUT NEVER HAVE] AND NOTICED WHAT LOOKED LIKE A STAR MOVING KINDA SLOWLY AND I TOLD MY GIRLFRIEND TO LOOK AT IT AND SHE WAS SURPRISED TO. AND WE WATCHED IT FOR ABOUT A MINUTE AND IT JUST DISSAPEARED ALMOST LIKE ALL LIGHTS JUST WENT OFF, NOT LIKE IT FLEW AWAY. DONT KNOW IF IT WAS A MILITARY PROJECT OR SOMETHING ELSE. BUT WHY HAVE A MILITARY TEST OVER BOISE ID. I DONT KNOW IF ITS EVEN INTERESTING TO YOU OR NOT BUT THERE IT IS. P.S. YOU GUYS ARE AWESOME IF YOU EVER NEED HELP WITH ANYTHING PLEASE ASK. THANX
trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
